title: FS East 2023
subtitle: PRV 23 - The only Indian team to score a podium in this competition.

title: FS Germany 2023
subtitle: PRV 23 - The fastest Indian Team in the competition.

title: Formula Bharat 2023
subtitle: PRV 23 - Kicking off the 2023 season with a strong return for the team by qualifying for all the finals of the static events.

title: Formula Student Online 2021
subtitle: PRV21 - The highest overall finish by an Indian team in an International event. A second podium in BPP event and a first podium in Dynamic Event propelled the team to receive an Invitation to Formula Student East.

title: FSEV 2021
subtitle: PRV21 - The team's first attempt at FSEV gave them a top 10 finish competing against the top EV teams in the world. This also helped in gaining the team confidence for a smooth possible transition towards EV.

title: Formula Bharat 2021
subtitle: PRV21 - A podium comeback at Formula Bharat 21 Virtual Event. Given the pandemic, the team collaborated smoothly while still aiming for excellence notwithstanding the challenges of working remotely for the first time.

title: Formula Student Online 2020
subtitle: PRV 20 - The only Indian team to participate in the virtual event. Our highest ever overall finish and first podium in the BPP at an international event.

title: FS Germany 2019
subtitle: PRV 19-Highest ever points scored by an Indian team at the Engineering Design event at Formula Student Germany and the first ever team to win the D-BASF best use of 3D printing award at the event.
details: D-BASF best use of 3D printing award winners

title: Formula SAE-A 2018
subtitle: PRV 18 - Highest ever points scored by an Indian team at the Engineering Design event.

title: FS Germany 2017
subtitle: PRV 18 - Highest ever points scored by an Indian team at the Engineering Design event.

title: Formula Bharat 2017
subtitle: PRV 16 - Car that raced to be the best in India.
details: Special Award for Spirit of FSI

title: Formula Student Germany 2016
subtitle: PRV 16 was the fastest among all Indian teams.

title: Formula Student India 2016
subtitle: Won 7/11 Trophies
details: Special Awards for Spirit of FSI and Cleanest Pit

title: Formula Student Germany 2015
subtitle: This was the best statics result by any Indian team in Formula Student Germany history

title: JK Tyre Formula Design Challenge 2015
subtitle: We set the national record of completing the autocross lap in 1 minute 23 seconds which is still un-beaten

title: Formula Student Germany 2014
subtitle: We were the Only Indian team to complete the entire Technical Inspection and compete in all the Dynamic Events
details: In 2014 we decided to move to Formula Student Germany as it is considered the biggest event in the Formula Student Circuit. Our first experience at the biggest stage was a valuable one and we learned a lot of new things from the top teams in the world. We had a great result here as we were the Only Indian team to complete the entire Technical Inspection and compete in all the Dynamic Events.

title: Formula Student Italy 2013
subtitle: Overall 20th position in the world out of the 45 competing teams
